channel.title: Uhhh?
channel.description:
Hi guys,
Let's get things straight.
I'm using Dementhium 639...
So here's the question.
How would I make membership temporary? Cuz donors are permanent and I want them to be only donors for like 30 days and then they would be normal players.
Cheers!
I Pk 22

item.title: Uhhh?
item.dc:creator: @I_Pk_22 I Pk 22
item.description:
@I_Pk_22 wrote:

Ok…but what do you mean by the “moreinfo file” ?

And do I just add the new variable to Player.java (near the top bit with all the public/private integers?)

Read full topic

item.title: Uhhh?
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:477973”][quote author=I Pk 22 link=topic=596169.msg4197488#msg4197488 date=1357722997]
Hi guys,

Let’s get things straight.

I’m using Dementhium 639…

So here’s the question.

How would I make membership temporary? Cuz donors are permanent and I want them to be only donors for like 30 days and then they would be normal players.

Cheers!

I Pk 22

[/quote]
You should first start by changing it from donors to membership… Seeing as donor is a rank when you donate, not pay monthly for membership.[/quote]

Yes, do as he suggested and change it to membership, to start.
There are many ways to do this, in my opinion the best way would be to create a variable that saves with the character file (or moreinfo file.) Name the variable character-membershipdays or whatever you’d like. Then add something like this to the give donor command (or the method you have, if you use automatic donations.)

The above sets user membership days to 30. Then you’ll want to start a timer somewhere, that takes note of the month/day they purchased membership. And when they log-in, have it compare the current date to the month/day they purchased membership, do some quick math, and reset membershipdays. You’ll also want something that tells them they’ve ran out of membership.

Read full topic

You should first start by changing it from donors to membership… Seeing as donor is a rank when you donate, not pay monthly for membership.
